abstract: The chairman of the Federal Reserve, Ben S. Bernanke, warned that high unemployment and reluctance of banks to make loans were likely to slow recovery.
snippet: The chairman of the Federal Reserve, Ben S. Bernanke, warned that high unemployment and reluctance of banks to make loans were likely to slow recovery.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  The chairman of the Federal Reserve, Ben S. Bernanke, warned on Monday that high unemployment and a continued reluctance by banks to make loans were likely to slow the economic recovery for the next year.

headline.main: Continuing Unemployment Is Predicted by Fed Chief
headline.print_headline: Continuing Unemployment Is Predicted By Fed Chief
